Package org.hornetq.spi.core.security

Security SPI.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HornetQSecurityManager
    Use to validate whether a user has is valid to connect to the server and perform certain functions
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HornetQSecurityManagerImpl
    A basic implementation of the HornetQSecurityManager.
    JAASSecurityManager
    This implementation delegates to the JAAS security interfaces.
    JAASSecurityManager.SimplePrincipal  

Package org.hornetq.spi.core.security Description

Security SPI.
This package defines the Service Provide Interface that secuity providers can implement to plug their implementation into HornetQ.
